items.sentence: I wish I could figure out how to get my car painted without paying a lot of money.
The biggest problem in Tom and Mary\'s marriage is Mary\'s mother\'s interference.
Why are you here in Australia? You\'re supposed to be in New Zealand, aren\'t you?
Tom has been in love with Mary since they were both in elementary school together.
Tom told his teacher that the reason he had been absent was that he had been sick.
